text: Eriswil is a municipality in the administrative district of Oberaargau in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. ==Gallery== File:2012-03-01-Supra Argovio (Foto Dietrich Michael Weidmann) 140.JPG|Eriswil File:2012-03-01-Supra Argovio (Foto Dietrich Michael Weidmann) 141.JPG|Protestant church of Eriswil ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website of Eriswil Category:Municipalities in Oberaargau
